code: import React from"react";import"./RollHistory-styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RollHistoryComponent=_ref=>{let{history,onDelete,onRepeat}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"roll-history",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"roll-history__table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\u0414\u0430\u0442\u0430 \u0456 \u0424\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0443\u043B\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\u0417\u0430\u0433\u0430\u043B\u044C\u043D\u0438\u0439 \u0440\u0435\u0437\u0443\u043B\u044C\u0442\u0430\u0442"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"\u0414\u0456\u0457"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:history.map((roll,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:new Date(roll.date).toLocaleString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:roll.formula}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:roll.rolls.map(r=>r.value).join(", ")})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:roll.total}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onRepeat(roll),children:"\u041F\u043E\u0432\u0442\u043E\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(index),children:"\u0412\u0438\u0434\u0430\u043B\u0438\u0442\u0438"})]})]},index))})]})});};export default RollHistoryComponent;
